author: William Dugan
comment: Best wifi remote control for my Sky HD and smart TV love it

author: Ashley S
comment: Done bought this 2 times last time only had it for three days and my daughter broke my phone so had to get a new one used the same Google account but still have to pay again I have done spent 18 dollars not buying it again its so messed up

author: Mark Ash
comment: I had it for a week. Bought it for my "one time payment" got a new phone and it wants me to buy it again.

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: If you use the same Google Play account you can download it to your new phone for free.

comment: It keeps asking to type in the numbers on the screen but none ever appear and it's annoying that I just can't run the application without having it ask for the numbers 10 times.

comment: Doesn't work

author: David Maz
comment: Upgrading review because it's one of the few android wear remotes that works I've found. Sure it's buggy sometimes and inconsistent oftentimes, but it at least it mostly works.
title: Works.

comment: Moment I opened the app my Sony Bravia prompted me to pair with my phone and I was given options to control it and the Sky box, works amazingly well!
title: Simple

comment: Looks good and works OK but limited range of models supported for control via IP means it's unlikely you'll be able to control all your AV equipment using this app unless your device has an IR blaster.

comment: It's good if you  have children in case they turned it over

comment: I like it, but why only let us try the trial only?

author: marc damron
comment: Way better than the stock app for controlling stereo receiver
title: Love it

author: JimmyYT
comment: I can just control my TV easily
title: BEST APP EVER!

author: Joseph Bejm
comment: I returned the pay version, so I played with free version.................................... I could not connect to ONKYO receiver. with my NOTE 4 phone. But other problem I found that when you select the channel by Icon let say Disney Channel then on top it shows the selected channel plus the Icon but then when I change channel to local by numbers the Disney channel still shows with the icon but on the bottom it shows with very small letters what's playing.And there is no LOCAL channels Icons that I can assign it my self to my  channels .......................... Other problem is that the channel return is hidden all the way in the back that you have to find it before you can go back to last channel. So it's not easy to do some stuff.  You should think what is more used when using remote or make it that a user can move and position buttons on it's own.....................

author: Lisa O'Donoghue
comment: I loved this app when first installed,  it worked a treat and allowed me to change the channels,  get into the planner, do anything my remote could do,  which was my saving grace after the Magic Eye stopped working for no reason. However, on day 3 it stopped working and I'm back to square one.  I uninstalled the app and tried again,  but it won't work. I've also tried other sky remote apps but they're all crap,  a shame then this failed cos I would've given it 5 stars :(
title: Stopped working after 2 days!

author: Alex Ryan
comment: I will keep this, it's the only, ONLY app that actually works!!!
title: Finally an app that actually works!!!

author: Shiona Shiona
comment: Now way! I may as well buy one from walmart.
title: Pay $9 for this!?

author: Ian Grody
comment: Not a bad concept, especially with Wear support. Does need some UI tweaking on phones UI, however, but all in all I tip my hat. Will see how this pans out - but for £6 its cheaper than a replacement remote and seems less laggy than Panasonic's actual app, TV Remote 2. Plus I can control many more devices too with MyAV.
title: Panasonic Viera

author: Steve Mackenzie
comment: Free trial good but old looking graphics and £5.99 for pro is not worth it.  Uninstalled after trial
title: OK but free apps better

author: Melissa Brown
comment: It works great, however, it only works for about a week or two and then they tell you the trial ran out and they want $9 for the app. It's a bit sketch when they don't tell you up front that the app is only a trial! I'm going to download an app that's more upfront.

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: The very first line of the description is... "This is a free 7 day trial of the main MyAV Pro app. " Can't be more "up front" than that!

title: Works great until they bait and switch

author: Fred Andrews
comment: Sky box, TV and onkyo receiver all controlled perfectly
title: Fantastic

comment: Ace
